Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.application

Class DefaultSignServiceEngineManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.signservice.application.DefaultSignServiceEngineManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignServiceEngineManager
    public class DefaultSignServiceEngineManager
extends Object
implements SignServiceEngineManager
    The main application bean. The SignService engine manager is responsible of routing every call to a matching engine.
